fragments.title: Properties of Entity
fragments.fragmentQuery: SELECT ?Entity ?Property ?PropertyLabel ?Value (coalesce(?ValueL, ?Value) as ?ValueLabel) where{  ?Entity ?Property ?Value . OPTIONAL{?Property rdfs:label ?PropertyLabel} . OPTIONAL {?Value rdfs:label ?ValueL}VALUES(?Entity){(%entity%)}} order by ?Property

fragments.title: About the Client
fragments.fragmentQuery: SELECT distinct ?client ?clientName ?ultimateParent ?ultimateParentName ?companiesHouseLink  ?ftseClassification ?sicCode ?sicCodeName ?sicCodeLink ?linklatersSector ?linklatersSectorName ?managingRelationshipPartner ?managingRelationshipPartnerName ?clientType  ?clientTypeName where{    ?client a <http://data.linklaters.com/Client> .    ?client <http://data.linklaters.com/clientName> ?clientName .    OPTIONAL {?client <http://data.linklaters.com/isClientOfCompany> ?ultimateParent . ?ultimateParent <http://data.linklaters.com/companyName> ?ultimateParentName .  }    OPTIONAL {?client <http://data.linklaters.com/companiesHouseLink> ?companiesHouseLink .  }  OPTIONAL {?client <http://data.linklaters.com/ftseClassification> ?ftseClassification  }    OPTIONAL {?client <http://data.linklaters.com/isClientOfSICCode> ?sicCode . ?sicCode <http://data.linklaters.com/sicCodeName> ?sicCodeName . ?sicCode <http://data.linklaters.com/sicCodeLink> ?sicCodeLink }    OPTIONAL {?client <http://data.linklaters.com/isClientOfLinklatersSector> ?linklatersSector . ?linklatersSector <http://data.linklaters.com/sectorName> ?linklatersSectorName . }   OPTIONAL {?client <http://data.linklaters.com/isClientOfManagingRelationshipPartner> ?managingRelationshipPartner . ?managingRelationshipPartner <http://data.linklaters.com/personName> ?managingRelationshipPartnerName . }   OPTIONAL {?client <http://data.linklaters.com/isClientOfClientType> ?clientType . ?clientType <http://data.linklaters.com/clientTypeName> ?clientTypeName . }   VALUES(?client){(%entity%)}}

fragments.title: Matters associated with Client
fragments.fragmentQuery: SELECT distinct ?client ?matter ?matterName (group_concat(?transactionTypeName; separator = '; ') as ?transactionTypes) ?practiceGroup ?practiceGroupName  ?workInProgress ?netValueBeforeTax ?releasedDate where{   ?client a <http://data.linklaters.com/Client> .   ?matter <http://data.linklaters.com/isMatterOfClient> ?client .   ?matter a <http://data.linklaters.com/Matter> .  ?matter <http://data.linklaters.com/matterName>  ?matterName .  OPTIONAL{?matter  <http://data.linklaters.com/isMatterOfTransactionType> ?transactionType . ?transactionType <http://data.linklaters.com/transactionTypeName> ?transactionTypeName }  OPTIONAL{?matter  <http://data.linklaters.com/isMatterOfPracticeGroup> ?practiceGroup . ?practiceGroup <http://data.linklaters.com/practiceGroupName> ?practiceGroupName }  OPTIONAL{ ?matter <http://data.linklaters.com/wIPNCRFees> ?workInProgress .}  OPTIONAL{ ?matter <http://data.linklaters.com/pcbBilled> ?netValueBeforeTax .}  OPTIONAL{ ?matter <http://data.linklaters.com/releasedDate> ?releasedDate .}    VALUES(?client){(%entity%)} } group by ?client ?matter ?matterName ?practiceGroup ?practiceGroupName ?workInProgress ?netValueBeforeTax  ?releasedDate order by desc(?releasedDate) LIMIT 6

fragments.title: Properties of Entity
fragments.fragmentQuery: SELECT ?Entity ?Property ?PropertyLabel ?Value (coalesce(?ValueL, ?Value) as ?ValueLabel) where{  ?Entity ?Property ?Value . OPTIONAL{?Property rdfs:label ?PropertyLabel} . OPTIONAL {?Value rdfs:label ?ValueL}VALUES(?Entity){(%entity%)}} order by ?Property

fragments.title: About the Deal
fragments.fragmentQuery: SELECT distinct ?deal ?dealDescription ?matter ?matterName   (group_concat(distinct ?transactionTypeName; separator = '; ') as ?transactionTypes) ?linklatersSector ?linklatersSectorName  ?jurisdiction ?jurisdictionName ?country  ?countryName  ?region ?regionName (group_concat(distinct ?practiceGroupName; separator = '; ') as ?practiceGroups)  ?status ?matterStatus  (group_concat(distinct ?officeName; separator = '; ') as ?offices)WHERE {  ?deal a <http://data.linklaters.com/Deal>  .OPTIONAL{   ?deal <http://data.linklaters.com/isDealOfMatter> ?matter . ?deal <http://data.linklaters.com/dealDescription>  ?dealDescription . OPTIONAL{?matter <http://data.linklaters.com/matterName> ?matterName .}   OPTIONAL{?matter  <http://data.linklaters.com/isMatterOfTransactionType> ?transactionType . ?transactionType <http://data.linklaters.com/transactionTypeName>  ?transactionTypeName }  OPTIONAL{?matter  <http://data.linklaters.com/isMatterOfLinklatersSector> ?linklatersSector . ?linklatersSector <http://data.linklaters.com/sectorName> ?linklatersSectorName  }  OPTIONAL{?matter  <http://data.linklaters.com/isMatterOfJurisdiction> ?jurisdiction . ?jurisdiction <http://data.linklaters.com/jurisdictionName> ?jurisdictionName .}  OPTIONAL{?deal <http://data.linklaters.com/isDealOfOffice> ?office .            ?office <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#label> ?officeName .           ?office <http://data.linklaters.com/isOfficeOfCountry>  ?country .           ?country <http://data.linklaters.com/countryName> ?countryName .           ?country <http://data.linklaters.com/isCountryOfRegion> ?region .           ?region <http://data.linklaters.com/regionName> ?regionName .          }     OPTIONAL{?matter  <http://data.linklaters.com/isMatterOfJurisdiction> ?jurisdiction . ?jurisdiction <http://data.linklaters.com/jurisdictionName> ?jurisdictionName .}  OPTIONAL{?matter  <http://data.linklaters.com/isMatterOfPracticeGroup> ?practiceGroup .?practiceGroup <http://data.linklaters.com/practiceGroupName> ?practiceGroupName . }  OPTIONAL{?matter  <http://data.linklaters.com/isMatterOfStatus> ?status . ?status <http://data.linklaters.com/statusName> ?matterStatus .}    } VALUES(?deal){(%entity%)}}group by ?deal ?dealDescription ?matter ?matterName  ?linklatersSector ?linklatersSectorName  ?jurisdiction ?jurisdictionName  ?country   ?countryName ?region ?regionName  ?status ?matterStatus

fragments.title: Financial Summary of Deal
fragments.fragmentQuery: SELECT distinct ?feeStructure ?feeStructureName  ?totalHoursRecorded  ?workInProgress  ?netValueBeforeTax  ?NMOFeeEstimate ?capping WHERE {   ?deal a <http://data.linklaters.com/Deal>  . ?deal <http://data.linklaters.com/isDealOfMatter> ?matter . OPTIONAL{ ?matter <http://data.linklaters.com/isMatterOfFeeStructure> ?feeStructure . ?feeStructure <http://data.linklaters.com/feeStructureName>  ?feeStructureName  . }OPTIONAL{ ?matter <http://data.linklaters.com/totalHoursRecorded> ?totalHoursRecorded . }OPTIONAL{ ?matter <http://data.linklaters.com/wIPNCRFees> ?workInProgress .}OPTIONAL{ ?matter <http://data.linklaters.com/pcbBilled> ?netValueBeforeTax .}OPTIONAL{ ?matter <http://data.linklaters.com/nMOFeeEstimate> ?NMOFeeEstimate .}OPTIONAL{ ?matter <http://data.linklaters.com/cappingAmount> ?capping .}VALUES(?deal){(%entity%)}}

fragments.title: Related Deals
fragments.fragmentQuery: SELECT distinct ?relatedDeal ?relatedDealName   (group_concat(?transactionTypeName; separator = '; ') as ?transactionTypes) WHERE {  ?deal a <http://data.linklaters.com/Deal>  . OPTIONAL{  ?deal <http://data.linklaters.com/isDealOfMatter> ?matter .  ?relatedDeal <http://data.linklaters.com/isDealOfMatter> ?matter . ?relatedDeal a <http://data.linklaters.com/Deal> . ?relatedDeal <http://data.linklaters.com/dealTitle> ?relatedDealName .  FILTER(?deal != ?relatedDeal)  OPTIONAL{ ?relatedDeal <http://data.linklaters.com/isDealOfTransactionType> ?transactionType . ?transactionType <http://data.linklaters.com/transactionTypeName>  ?transactionTypeName   }   }  VALUES(?deal){(%entity%)} } group by ?deal ?matter ?relatedDeal ?relatedDealName

fragments.title: People Involved in the Deal
fragments.fragmentQuery: SELECT distinct ?feeEarner ?feeEarnerName ?practiceGroup  ?practiceGroupName  ?job ?jobTitle   (sum(?chargeable) as ?totalChargeable)  WHERE {   ?deal a <http://data.linklaters.com/Deal>  . ?deal <http://data.linklaters.com/isDealOfMatter> ?matter . ?matter <http://data.linklaters.com/isMatterOfFee>  ?fee . ?fee <http://data.linklaters.com/isFeeOfFeeEarner>  ?feeEarner  .        ?feeEarner <http://data.linklaters.com/personName>  ?feeEarnerName . OPTIONAL{?feeEarner <http://data.linklaters.com/isPersonOfPracticeGroup>  ?practiceGroup . ?practiceGroup <http://data.linklaters.com/practiceGroupName>  ?practiceGroupName  . } OPTIONAL{?feeEarner <http://data.linklaters.com/isPersonOfJob>  ?job .?job <http://data.linklaters.com/jobTitle>  ?jobTitle  . } OPTIONAL{?fee <http://data.linklaters.com/chargeable>  ?chargeable  . } VALUES(?deal){(%entity%)} } group by ?matter ?feeEarner ?feeEarnerName  ?practiceGroup  ?practiceGroupName  ?job  ?jobTitle

fragments.title: Features of the Deal
fragments.fragmentQuery: SELECT distinct ?feature ?featureName WHERE {  ?deal a <http://data.linklaters.com/Deal>  . OPTIONAL{  ?deal <http://data.linklaters.com/isDealOfFeature> ?feature . ?feature <http://data.linklaters.com/featureName>  ?featureName}  VALUES(?deal){(%entity%)}}

fragments.title: Documents associated with the Deal
fragments.fragmentQuery: SELECT distinct ?document  ?documentName ?documentReference ?documentType ?documentTypeName  WHERE {  ?deal a <http://data.linklaters.com/Deal>  .  OPTIONAL{?deal <http://data.linklaters.com/isDealOfDocument> ?document .  ?document <http://data.linklaters.com/documentReference> ?documentReference .  ?document <http://data.linklaters.com/documentDescription> ?documentName .   ?document <http://data.linklaters.com/isDocumentOfDocumentType> ?documentType .  ?documentType <http://data.linklaters.com/documentTypeName> ?documentTypeName  .            } VALUES(?deal){(%entity%)} }

fragments.title: Recent (6) deals with this feature
fragments.fragmentQuery: SELECT ?feature ?deal ?dealTitle ?matter ?matterName ?linklatersSector ?linklatersSectorName ?businessSector  ?businessSectorName ?client ?clientName ?office ?officeName ?releasedDate ?pcbBilled (group_concat(distinct ?transactionTypeName; separator = '; ') as ?transactionTypes) (group_concat(distinct ?otherFeatureName; separator = '; ') as ?otherFeatures) WHERE { ?feature a <http://data.linklaters.com/Feature> . ?deal <http://data.linklaters.com/isDealOfFeature> ?feature . ?deal a <http://data.linklaters.com/Deal> . ?deal <http://data.linklaters.com/dealTitle> ?dealTitle . OPTIONAL{?deal  <http://data.linklaters.com/isDealOfTransactionType> ?transactionType . ?transactionType <http://data.linklaters.com/transactionTypeName>  ?transactionTypeName } OPTIONAL{?deal  <http://data.linklaters.com/isDealOfLinklatersSector> ?linklatersSector . ?linklatersSector <http://data.linklaters.com/sectorName> ?linklatersSectorName  } OPTIONAL{?deal  <http://data.linklaters.com/isDealOfBusinessSector> ?businessSector . ?businessSector <http://data.linklaters.com/sicCodeName> ?businessSectorName  } ?deal <http://data.linklaters.com/isDealOfMatter> ?matter . ?matter <http://data.linklaters.com/matterName> ?matterName .OPTIONAL{?matter  <http://data.linklaters.com/isMatterOfClient> ?client . ?client <http://data.linklaters.com/clientName> ?clientName . } OPTIONAL{?matter  <http://data.linklaters.com/isMatterOfOffice> ?office .?office <http://data.linklaters.com/officeName> ?officeName . } OPTIONAL{ ?matter <http://data.linklaters.com/releasedDate> ?releasedDate .}   OPTIONAL{ ?matter <http://data.linklaters.com/pcbBilled> ?pcbBilled .}. OPTIONAL{?deal <http://data.linklaters.com/isDealOfFeature> ?otherFeature . ?otherFeature <http://data.linklaters.com/featureName> ?otherFeatureName . } VALUES(?feature){(%entity%)} } group by ?feature ?deal ?dealTitle ?matter ?matterName ?linklatersSector ?linklatersSectorName ?businessSector  ?businessSectorName ?client ?clientName ?office ?officeName ?releasedDate ?pcbBilled order by desc(?releasedDate) LIMIT 6

fragments.title: Recent (6) documents with this feature
fragments.fragmentQuery: SELECT ?feature ?deal ?dealTitle ?document ?documentReference ?documentName ?documentType ?documentTypeName  ?matter ?matterName ?client ?clientName ?releasedDate (group_concat(distinct ?otherFeatureName; separator = '; ') as ?otherFeatures) WHERE { ?feature a <http://data.linklaters.com/Feature> . ?deal <http://data.linklaters.com/isDealOfFeature> ?feature . ?deal a <http://data.linklaters.com/Deal> . ?deal <http://data.linklaters.com/dealTitle> ?dealTitle .?deal <http://data.linklaters.com/isDealOfDocument> ?document . ?document <http://data.linklaters.com/documentReference> ?documentReference . ?document <http://data.linklaters.com/documentDescription> ?documentName . ?document <http://data.linklaters.com/isDocumentOfDocumentType> ?documentType .  ?documentType <http://data.linklaters.com/documentTypeName> ?documentTypeName  . ?deal <http://data.linklaters.com/isDealOfMatter> ?matter .  ?matter <http://data.linklaters.com/matterName> ?matterName . OPTIONAL{?matter  <http://data.linklaters.com/isMatterOfClient> ?client . ?client <http://data.linklaters.com/clientName> ?clientName . }  OPTIONAL{ ?matter <http://data.linklaters.com/releasedDate> ?releasedDate .}    OPTIONAL{?deal <http://data.linklaters.com/isDealOfFeature> ?otherFeature . ?otherFeature <http://data.linklaters.com/featureName> ?otherFeatureName . } VALUES(?feature){(%entity%)} } group by ?feature ?deal ?dealTitle ?document ?documentReference ?documentName ?documentType ?documentTypeName ?matter ?matterName ?client ?clientName ?releasedDate  order by desc(?releasedDate) LIMIT 20

fragments.title: About the Linklaters Sector
fragments.fragmentQuery: SELECT distinct ?linklatersSector ?linklatersSectorName  where{   ?linklatersSector a <http://data.linklaters.com/LinklatersSector> .   ?linklatersSector <http://data.linklaters.com/sectorName> ?linklatersSectorName VALUES(?linklatersSector){(%entity%)} }

fragments.title: Clients within Linklaters Sector
fragments.fragmentQuery: SELECT distinct ?client ?clientName  ?clientType ?clientTypeName  ?managingRelationshipPartner  ?managingRelationshipPartnerName where{ ?linklatersSector a <http://data.linklaters.com/LinklatersSector> . ?client <http://data.linklaters.com/isClientOfLinklatersSector> ?linklatersSector .  OPTIONAL{?client <http://data.linklaters.com/clientName> ?clientName . }  OPTIONAL{?client <http://data.linklaters.com/isClientOfClientType>  ?clientType . ?clientType <http://data.linklaters.com/clientTypeName> ?clientTypeName . }   OPTIONAL{?client <http://data.linklaters.com/isClientOfManagingRelationshipPartner>  ?managingRelationshipPartner . ?managingRelationshipPartner <http://data.linklaters.com/personName> ?managingRelationshipPartnerName . }  VALUES(?linklatersSector){(%entity%)}}

fragments.title: Recent Matters within Linklaters Sector
fragments.fragmentQuery: SELECT distinct ?matter ?matterName (group_concat(?transactionTypeName; separator = '; ') as ?transactionTypes) ?practiceGroup ?practiceGroupName ?workInProgress ?netValueBeforeTax ?releasedDate where{ ?linklatersSector a <http://data.linklaters.com/LinklatersSector> . ?matter a <http://data.linklaters.com/Matter> . ?matter <http://data.linklaters.com/matterName> ?matterName . ?matter  <http://data.linklaters.com/isMatterOfLinklatersSector> ?linklatersSector . OPTIONAL{?matter  <http://data.linklaters.com/isMatterOfTransactionType> ?transactionType . ?transactionType <http://data.linklaters.com/transactionTypeName>  ?transactionTypeName } OPTIONAL{ ?matter <http://data.linklaters.com/wIPNCRFees> ?workInProgress .} OPTIONAL{ ?matter <http://data.linklaters.com/pcbBilled> ?netValueBeforeTax .}   OPTIONAL{?matter  <http://data.linklaters.com/isMatterOfPracticeGroup> ?practiceGroup .?practiceGroup <http://data.linklaters.com/practiceGroupName> ?practiceGroupName . }  OPTIONAL{ ?matter <http://data.linklaters.com/releasedDate> ?releasedDate .}   VALUES(?linklatersSector){(%entity%)} } group by ?linklatersSector ?matter ?matterName ?practiceGroup ?practiceGroupName ?workInProgress ?netValueBeforeTax ?releasedDate order by desc(?releasedDate) LIMIT 6

fragments.title: About the Matter
fragments.fragmentQuery: SELECT distinct ?matter ?matterName  (group_concat(?transactionTypeName; separator = '; ') as ?transactionTypes) ?linklatersSector ?linklatersSectorName ?jurisdiction ?jurisdictionName ?region ?regionName ?country ?countryName ?office  ?officeName ?practiceGroup ?practiceGroupName ?status ?matterStatus  ?client ?clientName ?matterManager  ?matterManagerName  ?matterPartner ?matterPartnerName WHERE {  ?matter a <http://data.linklaters.com/Matter> . OPTIONAL{?matter <http://data.linklaters.com/matterName> ?matterName .}  OPTIONAL{?matter  <http://data.linklaters.com/isMatterOfTransactionType> ?transactionType . ?transactionType <http://data.linklaters.com/transactionTypeName>  ?transactionTypeName } OPTIONAL{?matter  <http://data.linklaters.com/isMatterOfLinklatersSector> ?linklatersSector . ?linklatersSector <http://data.linklaters.com/sectorName> ?linklatersSectorName  } OPTIONAL{?matter  <http://data.linklaters.com/isMatterOfJurisdiction> ?jurisdiction . ?jurisdiction <http://data.linklaters.com/jurisdictionName> ?jurisdictionName .} OPTIONAL{?matter  <http://data.linklaters.com/isMatterOfRegion> ?region . ?region <http://data.linklaters.com/regionName> ?regionName .} OPTIONAL{?matter  <http://data.linklaters.com/isMatterOfOffice> ?office .?office <http://data.linklaters.com/officeName> ?officeName . ?office <http://data.linklaters.com/isOfficeOfCountry>  ?country . ?country <http://data.linklaters.com/countryName> ?countryName .}  OPTIONAL{?matter  <http://data.linklaters.com/isMatterOfPracticeGroup> ?practiceGroup .?practiceGroup <http://data.linklaters.com/practiceGroupName> ?practiceGroupName . } OPTIONAL{?matter  <http://data.linklaters.com/isMatterOfStatus> ?status . ?status <http://data.linklaters.com/statusName> ?matterStatus .} OPTIONAL{?matter  <http://data.linklaters.com/isMatterOfClient> ?client . ?client <http://data.linklaters.com/clientName> ?clientName . } OPTIONAL{?matter  <http://data.linklaters.com/isMatterOfMatterManager> ?matterManager . ?matterManager <http://data.linklaters.com/personName> ?matterManagerName .OPTIONAL{?matterPartner  <http://data.linklaters.com/isPartnerOfMatter> ?matter . ?matterPartner <http://data.linklaters.com/personName> ?matterPartnerName .}}  VALUES(?matter){(%entity%)}} group by ?matter ?matterName ?linklatersSector ?linklatersSectorName ?jurisdiction ?jurisdictionName ?region ?regionName ?country ?countryName ?office  ?officeName ?practice ?practiceGroup ?practiceGroupName  ?status ?matterStatus  ?client ?clientName ?matterManager ?matterManagerName  ?matterPartner ?matterPartnerName

fragments.title: Financial Summary of Matter
fragments.fragmentQuery: SELECT distinct ?feeStructure ?feeStructureName  ?totalHoursRecorded  ?workInProgress  ?netValueBeforeTax  ?NMOFeeEstimate ?capping WHERE {  ?matter a <http://data.linklaters.com/Matter> .OPTIONAL{ ?matter <http://data.linklaters.com/isMatterOfFeeStructure> ?feeStructure . ?feeStructure <http://data.linklaters.com/feeStructureName>  ?feeStructureName  . }OPTIONAL{ ?matter <http://data.linklaters.com/totalHoursRecorded> ?totalHoursRecorded . }OPTIONAL{ ?matter <http://data.linklaters.com/wIPNCRFees> ?workInProgress .}OPTIONAL{ ?matter <http://data.linklaters.com/pcbBilled> ?netValueBeforeTax .}OPTIONAL{ ?matter <http://data.linklaters.com/nMOFeeEstimate> ?NMOFeeEstimate .}OPTIONAL{ ?matter <http://data.linklaters.com/cappingAmount> ?capping .} VALUES(?matter){(%entity%)} }

fragments.title: People Involved in the Matter
fragments.fragmentQuery: SELECT distinct ?feeEarner ?feeEarnerName ?practiceGroup  ?practiceGroupName  ?job   ?jobTitle  (sum(?chargeable) as ?totalChargeable) WHERE {  ?matter a <http://data.linklaters.com/Matter> .?matter <http://data.linklaters.com/isMatterOfFee>  ?fee . ?fee <http://data.linklaters.com/isFeeOfFeeEarner>  ?feeEarner  . ?feeEarner <http://data.linklaters.com/personName>  ?feeEarnerName  . OPTIONAL{?feeEarner <http://data.linklaters.com/isPersonOfPracticeGroup>  ?practiceGroup . ?practiceGroup <http://data.linklaters.com/practiceGroupName>  ?practiceGroupName  . } OPTIONAL{?feeEarner <http://data.linklaters.com/isPersonOfJob>  ?job .?job <http://data.linklaters.com/jobTitle>  ?jobTitle  . } OPTIONAL{?fee <http://data.linklaters.com/chargeable>  ?chargeable  . } VALUES(?matter){(%entity%)} } group by ?matter ?feeEarner ?feeEarnerName ?practice  ?practiceGroupName ?practiceGroup ?job  ?jobTitle

fragments.title: Deals Associated with the Matter
fragments.fragmentQuery: SELECT  distinct ?matter ?deal ?dealTitle ?dealDescription ?transactionType ?transactionTypeName  ?practiceGroup ?practiceGroupName (group_concat(?featureName; separator = '; ' ) as ?features) WHERE {  ?matter a <http://data.linklaters.com/Matter> . OPTIONAL{ ?matter <http://data.linklaters.com/isMatterOfDeal> ?deal .  ?deal <http://data.linklaters.com/dealTitle> ?dealTitle OPTIONAL{ ?deal <http://data.linklaters.com/dealDescription> ?dealDescription .} OPTIONAL{ ?deal <http://data.linklaters.com/isDealOfTransactionType> ?transactionType . ?transactionType <http://data.linklaters.com/transactionTypeName>  ?transactionTypeName . }  OPTIONAL{ ?deal <http://data.linklaters.com/isDealOfPracticeGroup> ?practiceGroup .?practiceGroup <http://data.linklaters.com/practiceGroupName>  ?practiceGroupName . }  OPTIONAL{ ?deal <http://data.linklaters.com/isDealOfFeature> ?feature . ?feature <http://data.linklaters.com/featureName> ?featureName} }VALUES(?matter){(%entity%)} } group by ?matter ?deal ?dealTitle ?dealDescription ?transactionType ?transactionTypeName  ?practiceGroup  ?practiceGroupName

fragments.title: About the Person
fragments.fragmentQuery: SELECT distinct ?person ?personName ?job ?jobTitle ?position ?division ?divisionName ?practiceGroup ?practiceGroupName ?profitCentre ?profitCentreName ?costCentre ?costCentreName  ?office  ?officeName  ?secondmentOffice ?secondmentOfficeName ?country ?countryName ?region  ?regionName ?nonGroupMembership ?membershipCountry ?professionalMembership where{ ?person a <http://data.linklaters.com/Person> . OPTIONAL{ ?person  <http://data.linklaters.com/personName> ?personName . } OPTIONAL{ ?person  <http://data.linklaters.com/isPersonOfJob> ?job . ?job  <http://data.linklaters.com/jobTitle> ?jobTitle .} OPTIONAL{ ?person  <http://data.linklaters.com/isPersonOfPosition> ?position . ?position  <http://data.linklaters.com/positionName> ?positionName . } OPTIONAL{ ?person  <http://data.linklaters.com/isPersonOfDivision> ?division . ?division  <http://data.linklaters.com/divisionName> ?divisionName . } OPTIONAL{ ?person  <http://data.linklaters.com/isPersonOfPracticeGroup> ?practiceGroup . ?practiceGroup  <http://data.linklaters.com/practiceGroupName> ?practiceGroupName . } OPTIONAL{ ?person  <http://data.linklaters.com/isPersonOfProfitCentre> ?profitCentre . ?profitCentre  <http://data.linklaters.com/profitCentreName> ?profitCentreName. } OPTIONAL{ ?person  <http://data.linklaters.com/isPersonOfCostCentre> ?costCentre . ?costCentre  <http://data.linklaters.com/costCentreName> ?costCentreName . } OPTIONAL{ ?person  <http://data.linklaters.com/isPersonOfOffice> ?office . ?office  <http://data.linklaters.com/officeName> ?officeName . } OPTIONAL{ ?person  <http://data.linklaters.com/hasSecondmentOffice> ?secondmentOffice . ?secondmentOffice  <http://data.linklaters.com/officeName> ?secondmentOfficeName . } OPTIONAL{ ?person  <http://data.linklaters.com/isPersonOfCountry> ?country . ?country  <http://data.linklaters.com/countryName> ?countryName . ?country  <http://data.linklaters.com/isCountryOfRegion> ?region . ?region  <http://data.linklaters.com/regionName> ?regionName .   } OPTIONAL{ ?person  <http://data.linklaters.com/nonGroupMembership> ?nonGroupMembership . } OPTIONAL{ ?person  <http://data.linklaters.com/membershipCountry> ?membershipCountry . } OPTIONAL{ ?person  <http://data.linklaters.com/professionalMembership> ?professionalMembership . } VALUES(?person){(%entity%)} }

fragments.title: Recent Matters within which Person Involved
fragments.fragmentQuery: SELECT distinct  ?matter ?matterName (group_concat(distinct ?transactionTypeName; separator = '; ') as ?transactionTypes) ?practiceGroup ?practiceGroupName (sum(?chargeable  ) as ?totalChargeable)  ?releasedDate ?closededDate WHERE{ ?person a <http://data.linklaters.com/Person> . VALUES(?person){(%entity%)} ?person <http://data.linklaters.com/isFeeEarnerOfMatter> ?matter . ?matter <http://data.linklaters.com/matterName> ?matterName .  OPTIONAL{?matter  <http://data.linklaters.com/isMatterOfTransactionType> ?transactionType . ?transactionType <http://data.linklaters.com/transactionTypeName>  ?transactionTypeName }  OPTIONAL{?matter  <http://data.linklaters.com/isMatterOfPracticeGroup> ?practiceGroup .?practiceGroup <http://data.linklaters.com/practiceGroupName> ?practiceGroupName . }  ?fee <http://data.linklaters.com/isFeeOfFeeEarner>  ?person .   ?fee  <http://data.linklaters.com/chargeable>   ?chargeable   .   ?fee  <http://data.linklaters.com/isFeeOfMatter>  ?matter .  OPTIONAL{ ?matter <http://data.linklaters.com/releasedDate> ?releasedDate .}  OPTIONAL{ ?matter <http://data.linklaters.com/closededDate> ?closededDate .}  } group by ?person ?matter ?matterName  ?practiceGroup ?practiceGroupName ?releasedDate ?closededDate order by desc(?releasedDate) LIMIT 6

fragments.title: Matters for which they are Matter Manager
Matters for which they are Matter Partner
Clients for which they are MRP
About the Practice Group
fragments.fragmentQuery: SELECT ?practiceGroup ?practiceGroupName  ?division  ?divisionName    (group_concat(distinct ?officeName; separator = '; ') as ?officeNames) WHERE {  ?practiceGroup a <http://data.linklaters.com/PracticeGroup> . OPTIONAL{?practiceGroup <http://data.linklaters.com/practiceGroupName> ?practiceGroupName .}  VALUES(?practiceGroup){(%entity%)}  OPTIONAL{ ?practiceGroup <http://data.linklaters.com/isPracticeGroupOfDivision> ?division  . ?division <http://data.linklaters.com/divisionName> ?divisionName }  OPTIONAL{ ?practiceGroup <http://data.linklaters.com/isPracticeGroupOfOffice> ?office  . ?office <http://data.linklaters.com/officeName> ?officeName }  } group by ?practiceGroup ?practiceGroupName  ?division  ?divisionName

fragments.title: Practice Partners
fragments.fragmentQuery: SELECT distinct  ?person  ?personName ?jobGroup ?position ?positionName  ?office  ?officeName ?profitCentre ?profitCentreName WHERE {  ?practiceGroup a <http://data.linklaters.com/PracticeGroup> . OPTIONAL{?practiceGroup <http://data.linklaters.com/practiceGroupName> ?practiceGroupName .} VALUES(?practiceGroup  ){(%entity% )}  OPTIONAL{ ?practiceGroup <http://data.linklaters.com/isPracticeGroupOfPerson> ?person  .   ?person <http://data.linklaters.com/personName> ?personName  .  ?person <http://data.linklaters.com/isPersonOfPosition> ?position  .  ?position <http://data.linklaters.com/positionName> ?positionName  . ?jobGroup <http://data.linklaters.com/isJobGroupOfPerson>  ?person   } VALUES(?jobGroup  ){(<http://data.linklaters.com/jobgroup/Partners>  )(<http://data.linklaters.com/jobgroup/National_Partners>  ) (<http://data.linklaters.com/jobgroup/Partners_%2526_Senior_Counsel>  )} OPTIONAL{ ?person <http://data.linklaters.com/isPersonOfOffice> ?office  . ?office <http://data.linklaters.com/officeName> ?officeName }  OPTIONAL{ ?person <http://data.linklaters.com/isPersonOfProfitCentre> ?profitCentre  .  ?profitCentre <http://data.linklaters.com/profitCentreName> ?profitCentreName  . }} order by ?personName

fragments.title: Practice PSLs
fragments.fragmentQuery: SELECT distinct  ?person  ?personName  ?jobGroup  ?position ?positionName ?office  ?officeName ?profitCentre ?profitCentreName WHERE { ?practiceGroup a <http://data.linklaters.com/PracticeGroup> . OPTIONAL{?practiceGroup <http://data.linklaters.com/practiceGroupName> ?practiceGroupName .}VALUES(?practiceGroup ){(%entity% )} OPTIONAL{ ?practiceGroup <http://data.linklaters.com/isPracticeGroupOfPerson> ?person  . ?person <http://data.linklaters.com/personName> ?personName  .   ?person <http://data.linklaters.com/isPersonOfPosition> ?position  .  ?position <http://data.linklaters.com/positionName> ?positionName  .     ?jobGroup <http://data.linklaters.com/isJobGroupOfPerson> ?person  .  }  VALUES( ?jobGroup ){( <http://data.linklaters.com/jobgroup/PSLs> )} OPTIONAL{ ?person <http://data.linklaters.com/isPersonOfOffice> ?office  . ?office <http://data.linklaters.com/officeName> ?officeName }  OPTIONAL{ ?person <http://data.linklaters.com/isPersonOfProfitCentre> ?profitCentre   .  ?profitCentre <http://data.linklaters.com/profitCentreName> ?profitCentreName  . }} order by ?personName

fragments.title: Members of Practice
fragments.fragmentQuery: SELECT distinct ?person  ?personName  ?position ?positionName ?office  ?officeName ?profitCentre ?profitCentreName WHERE {  ?practiceGroup a <http://data.linklaters.com/PracticeGroup> . OPTIONAL{?practiceGroup <http://data.linklaters.com/practiceGroupName> ?practiceGroupName .} VALUES(?practiceGroup ){(%entity% )} OPTIONAL{ ?practiceGroup <http://data.linklaters.com/isPracticeGroupOfPerson> ?person  . ?person <http://data.linklaters.com/personName> ?personName  . ?person <http://data.linklaters.com/isPersonOfPosition> ?position  .  ?position <http://data.linklaters.com/positionName> ?positionName  .  } OPTIONAL{ ?person <http://data.linklaters.com/isPersonOfOffice> ?office  . ?office <http://data.linklaters.com/officeName> ?officeName }  OPTIONAL{ ?person <http://data.linklaters.com/isPersonOfProfitCentre> ?profitCentre   . ?profitCentre <http://data.linklaters.com/profitCentreName> ?profitCentreName  . }}order by ?personName

fragments.title: Matters where Practice is lead
fragments.fragmentQuery: SELECT  ?matter  ?matterName ?client ?clientName ?linklatersSector  ?linklatersSectorName    (group_concat( ?transactionTypeName; separator = '; ') as ?transactionTypes)  ?totalHoursRecorded ?workInProgress ?netValueBeforeTax WHERE {  ?practiceGroup a <http://data.linklaters.com/PracticeGroup> . VALUES(?practiceGroup ){(%entity%  )} OPTIONAL{?practiceGroup <http://data.linklaters.com/practiceGroupName> ?practiceGroupName .}  ?practiceGroup  <http://data.linklaters.com/isPracticeGroupOfMatter>  ?matter.  ?matter <http://data.linklaters.com/matterName> ?matterName . ?matter <http://data.linklaters.com/isMatterOfPracticeGroup>  ?practiceGroup . ?matter   <http://data.linklaters.com/isMatterOfClient>  ?client.  ?client <http://data.linklaters.com/clientName> ?clientName .  ?matter   <http://data.linklaters.com/isMatterOfLinklatersSector>  ?linklatersSector.  ?linklatersSector <http://data.linklaters.com/sectorName> ?linklatersSectorName .  OPTIONAL{?matter  <http://data.linklaters.com/isMatterOfTransactionType> ?transactionType . ?transactionType <http://data.linklaters.com/transactionTypeName>  ?transactionTypeName }   OPTIONAL{ ?matter <http://data.linklaters.com/totalHoursRecorded> ?totalHoursRecorded . }  OPTIONAL{ ?matter <http://data.linklaters.com/wIPNCRFees> ?workInProgress .}  OPTIONAL{ ?matter <http://data.linklaters.com/pcbBilled> ?netValueBeforeTax .}} group by  ?matter  ?matterName ?client ?clientName ?linklatersSector  ?linklatersSectorName  ?totalHoursRecorded ?workInProgress ?netValueBeforeTax

fragments.title: Clients
fragments.fragmentQuery: SELECT distinct  ?client ?clientName ?linklatersSector ?linklatersSectorName ?clientType ?clientTypeName WHERE {  ?practiceGroup a <http://data.linklaters.com/PracticeGroup> . VALUES(?practiceGroup ){( %entity% )} OPTIONAL{?practiceGroup <http://data.linklaters.com/practiceGroupName> ?practiceGroupName .} ?practiceGroup  <http://data.linklaters.com/isPracticeGroupOfMatter>  ?matter.  ?matter <http://data.linklaters.com/matterName> ?matterName . ?matter <http://data.linklaters.com/isMatterOfPracticeGroup>  ?practiceGroup .  ?matter   <http://data.linklaters.com/isMatterOfClient>  ?client.  ?client <http://data.linklaters.com/clientName> ?clientName .  OPTIONAL { ?client   <http://data.linklaters.com/isClientOfLinklatersSector>  ?linklatersSector.  ?linklatersSector <http://data.linklaters.com/sectorName> ?linklatersSectorName . }  OPTIONAL{ ?client <http://data.linklaters.com/isClientOfClientType> ?clientType .  ?clientType <http://data.linklaters.com/clientTypeName> ?clientTypeName .  }} order by ?clientName

fragments.title: Recent Deals
fragments.fragmentQuery: SELECT ?deal ?dealTitle ?matter ?matterName  ?client ?clientName ?linklatersSector  ?linklatersSectorName ?office ?officeName ?totalHoursRecorded ?workInProgress ?netValueBeforeTax ?releasedDate  WHERE {  ?practiceGroup a <http://data.linklaters.com/PracticeGroup> .  VALUES(?practiceGroup ){(%entity%  )}  OPTIONAL{?practiceGroup <http://data.linklaters.com/practiceGroupName> ?practiceGroupName .}  ?practiceGroup  <http://data.linklaters.com/isPracticeGroupOfDeal>  ?deal.  ?deal <http://data.linklaters.com/dealTitle> ?dealTitle . ?deal <http://data.linklaters.com/isDealOfMatter>  ?matter .  ?matter <http://data.linklaters.com/matterName> ?matterName . ?matter   <http://data.linklaters.com/isMatterOfClient>  ?client.  ?client <http://data.linklaters.com/clientName> ?clientName . ?matter   <http://data.linklaters.com/isMatterOfLinklatersSector>  ?linklatersSector.  ?linklatersSector <http://data.linklaters.com/sectorName> ?linklatersSectorName . OPTIONAL{?matter  <http://data.linklaters.com/isMatterOfTransactionType> ?transactionType . ?transactionType <http://data.linklaters.com/transactionTypeName>  ?transactionTypeName } OPTIONAL{?matter  <http://data.linklaters.com/isMatterOfOffice> ?office . ?office <http://data.linklaters.com/officeName>  ?officeName } OPTIONAL{ ?matter <http://data.linklaters.com/totalHoursRecorded> ?totalHoursRecorded . } OPTIONAL{ ?matter <http://data.linklaters.com/wIPNCRFees> ?workInProgress .}  OPTIONAL{ ?matter <http://data.linklaters.com/pcbBilled> ?netValueBeforeTax .} OPTIONAL{ ?deal <http://data.linklaters.com/isDealOfFeature> ?feature . ?feature <http://data.linklaters.com/featureName> ?featureName} OPTIONAL{ ?matter <http://data.linklaters.com/releasedDate> ?releasedDate .}  } group by  ?practiceGroup ?practiceGroupName ?deal ?dealTitle ?matter ?matterName  ?client ?clientName ?linklatersSector  ?linklatersSectorName ?office ?officeName ?totalHoursRecorded ?workInProgress ?netValueBeforeTax ?releasedDate order by desc(?releasedDate) LIMIT 10
fragments.fragmentQueryWfeatures: SELECT ?deal ?dealTitle ?matter ?matterName  ?client ?clientName ?linklatersSector  ?linklatersSectorName ?office ?officeName ?totalHoursRecorded ?workInProgress ?netValueBeforeTax ?releasedDate (group_concat(distinct ?transactionTypeName; separator = '; ') as ?transactionTypes)  (group_concat(distinct ?featureName; separator = '; ' ) as ?features) WHERE {  ?practiceGroup a <http://data.linklaters.com/PracticeGroup> .  VALUES(?practiceGroup ){(%entity%  )}  OPTIONAL{?practiceGroup <http://data.linklaters.com/practiceGroupName> ?practiceGroupName .}  ?practiceGroup  <http://data.linklaters.com/isPracticeGroupOfDeal>  ?deal.  ?deal <http://data.linklaters.com/dealTitle> ?dealTitle . ?deal <http://data.linklaters.com/isDealOfMatter>  ?matter .  ?matter <http://data.linklaters.com/matterName> ?matterName . ?matter   <http://data.linklaters.com/isMatterOfClient>  ?client.  ?client <http://data.linklaters.com/clientName> ?clientName . ?matter   <http://data.linklaters.com/isMatterOfLinklatersSector>  ?linklatersSector.  ?linklatersSector <http://data.linklaters.com/sectorName> ?linklatersSectorName . OPTIONAL{?matter  <http://data.linklaters.com/isMatterOfTransactionType> ?transactionType . ?transactionType <http://data.linklaters.com/transactionTypeName>  ?transactionTypeName } OPTIONAL{?matter  <http://data.linklaters.com/isMatterOfOffice> ?office . ?office <http://data.linklaters.com/officeName>  ?officeName } OPTIONAL{ ?matter <http://data.linklaters.com/totalHoursRecorded> ?totalHoursRecorded . } OPTIONAL{ ?matter <http://data.linklaters.com/wIPNCRFees> ?workInProgress .}  OPTIONAL{ ?matter <http://data.linklaters.com/pcbBilled> ?netValueBeforeTax .} OPTIONAL{ ?deal <http://data.linklaters.com/isDealOfFeature> ?feature . ?feature <http://data.linklaters.com/featureName> ?featureName} OPTIONAL{ ?matter <http://data.linklaters.com/releasedDate> ?releasedDate .}  } group by  ?practiceGroup ?practiceGroupName ?deal ?dealTitle ?matter ?matterName  ?client ?clientName ?linklatersSector  ?linklatersSectorName ?office ?officeName ?totalHoursRecorded ?workInProgress ?netValueBeforeTax ?releasedDate order by desc(?releasedDate) LIMIT 10

fragments.title: Properties of Entity
fragments.fragmentQuery: SELECT ?Entity ?Property ?PropertyLabel ?Value (coalesce(?ValueL, ?Value) as ?ValueLabel) where{  ?Entity ?Property ?Value . OPTIONAL{?Property rdfs:label ?PropertyLabel} . OPTIONAL {?Value rdfs:label ?ValueL}VALUES(?Entity){(%entity%)}} order by ?Property
